title: Dying Light 2 Stay Human - Official Gameplay Trailer
description: Check out the all new Dying Light 2 Stay Human official gameplay trailer developed by Techland. Dying Light 2 Stay Human is the long awaited sequel to the original Dying Light which built a massive following and hardcore fan base.

title: Horizon Forbidden West Gameplay Breakdown | State of Play
description: Guerilla Game Developers breakdown some of the gameplay elements you'll encounter while playing Horizon Forbidden West. You'll get a taste of some of the weapons you can use to defeat your foes, as well as some gameplay mechanics that will elevate combat. We got to watch 14 minutes of gameplay revealed during Sony's State of Play for Horizon Forbidden West.

title: Horizon Forbidden West Gameplay Reveal | State of Play
description: Check out the all new Horizon Forbidden West Gameplay revealed during the Sony State of Play event!

title: Horizon Forbidden West Gameplay Reveal | State of Play
description: Tune in to a special State of Play, showing off the first look at gameplay for Horizon Forbidden West.

title: Resident Evil Village Mercenaries Mode with MANvsGAME On An 85-Inch TCL TV
description: (Presented by TCL) Kurt is joined by the one and only MANvsGAME as they try out Mercenaries Mode while playing on a massive 85-Inch TCL TV!

title: Sonic Central 30th Anniversary Livestream
description:
Tune in to Sonic Central, a virtual event where SEGA’s Sonic team will be joined by special guests to reveal upcoming projects, partnerships and events spanning the Sonic the Hedgehog franchise and beyond.

Check out some all new announcements in the Sonic universe!

title: Mass Effect Legendary Edition Review
description: Parts of Mass Effect: Legendary Edition show their age, but this remaster is largely an improvement over BioWare's original trilogy.

title: Unreal Engine 5 Early Access
description: Check out the new Unreal Engine 5 Early Access Trailer that was shown off today during the Unreal Engine Stream!
